# f5xc_ticket_tracking_system (Data Source)

Create Ticket Tracking System

~> **Note** For more information about this data source, please refer to the [F5 XC API Documentation](https://docs.cloud.f5.com/docs/api/).

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "f5xc_ticket_tracking_system" "example" {
  name      = "my-resource"
  namespace = "system"
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the TicketTrackingSystem.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the TicketTrackingSystem exists.

### Read-Only

- `annotations` (Map of String) Annotations applied to this resource.
- `description` (String) Description of the TicketTrackingSystem.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the resource.
- `labels` (Map of String) Labels applied to this resource.
